WindowBorder.description: Window border color. Only used on Linux.

Contents.description: Background color used in inputs, data grids, file content viewer, change lists, text diff viewer, etc.

Conflict.MineBG.description: Background color of 'Mine' section in merge conflict editor

Conflict.TheirsBG.description: Background color of 'Theirs' section in merge conflict editor

Border0.description: Border color used in some controls, like Window, Tab, Toolbar, etc.

Border1.description: Border color used in inputs, like TextBox, ComboBox, etc.

Border2.description: Border color used in visual lines, like seperators, Rectange, etc.

FlatButton.Background.description: Flat button background color, like `Cancel`, `Commit & Push` button

FlatButton.BackgroundHovered.description: Flat button background color when hovered, like `Cancel` button

FlatButton.FloatingBorder.description: Flat button (floating) border color. Used by hunk action buttons such as `Stage`/`Discard`/`Unstage`

FG1.description: Primary foreground color for all text elements

FG2.description: Secondary foreground color for all text elements

Diff.EmptyBG.description: Background color used in empty lines in diff viewer

Diff.AddedBG.description: Background color used in added lines in diff viewer

Diff.DeletedBG.description: Background color used in deleted lines in diff viewer

Diff.AddedHighlight.description: Background color used for changed words in added lines in diff viewer

Diff.DeletedHighlight.description: Background color used for changed words in deleted lines in diff viewer

Diff.BlockBorderHighlight.description: Border color used for highlighting current changed blocks in diff viewer

InlineCode.description: Background color for inline code in commit messages

InlineCodeFG.description: Foreground color for inline code in commit messages

DataGridHeaderBG.description: Background color for data grid headers

GraphPenThickness.description: Thickness of pens to draw commit graph

OpacityForNotMergedCommits.description: Opacity for commits that not belongs (haven't been merged) to current branch in histories view

GraphColors.description: Array of colors used to draw the commit graph
